statements: SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1
SELECT lecture_title, slide_title, assignment_title FROM course_materials WHERE lecture_date >= '2021-10-01'
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM course_materials WHERE slide_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT DISTINCT slide_date FROM course_materials ORDER BY slide_date DESC
SELECT * FROM course_materials ORDER BY assignment_deadline ASC
SELECT * FROM course_materials WHERE lecture_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY lecture_title DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT course_id, lecture_title, lecture_date FROM course_materials WHERE slide_date < '2022-05-01' ORDER BY course_id ASC
SELECT lecture_title, slide_title, assignment_title FROM course_materials WHERE assignment_deadline < '2022-10-01' ORDER BY course_id, assignment_deadline DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM course_materials WHERE slide_date > '2022-03-15' ORDER BY slide_date ASC, course_id DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT slide_title, slide_content FROM course_materials WHERE lecture_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY slide_date DESC, lecture_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration > 60;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM lectures ORDER BY lecture_date DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_lectures FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_date FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT assignment_name, assignment_deadline FROM assignments WHERE assignment_id = 3;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_name, lecture_date, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_deadline DESC;
SELECT lecture_name, lecture_duration FROM lectures WHERE lecture_duration < 60;
SELECT * FROM Lectures ORDER BY lecture_title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM Lectures WHERE published_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT slide_title, slide_order FROM Slides WHERE slide_order BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY slide_order ASC;
SELECT lecture_id, lecture_title, published_date FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT assignment_title, due_date FROM Assignments ORDER BY due_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT lecture_title FROM Lectures WHERE published_date = '2022-10-05';
SELECT assignment_title, assignment_description FROM Assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-11-30';
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_content FROM Lectures WHERE lecture_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT lecture_title, published_date FROM Lectures ORDER BY published_date DESC;
SELECT slide_title, slide_order FROM Slides WHERE slide_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT title, description FROM lectures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, description FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, start_date, end_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT l.title, l.description, c.title AS course_title FROM lectures l JOIN courses c ON l.course_id = c.id;
SELECT title, due_date FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT s.title, s.slide_number, l.title AS lecture_title FROM slides s JOIN lectures l ON s.lecture_id = l.id WHERE l.id = 3;
SELECT c.title, COUNT(l.id) AS lecture_count FROM courses c LEFT JOIN lectures l ON c.id = l.course_id GROUP BY c.title;
SELECT title, description FROM assignments WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lectures;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_description FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 201;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date FROM assignments WHERE course_id = 301 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM lectures WHERE lecture_id = 1;
SELECT lecture_title, lecture_description FROM lectures WHERE course_id = 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT lecture_title, COUNT(*) AS slide_count FROM lectures LEFT JOIN slides ON lectures.lecture_id = slides.lecture_id GROUP BY lectures.lecture_id;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
